Description:
Supply chains are evolving from reactive systems to intelligent, autonomous networks. The agentic supply chainâ€”powered by AI agentsâ€”delivers real-time visibility, predictive insights, and self-orchestrating operations. In this session, discover how AI-driven agents are transforming planning, logistics, and fulfillment to unlock growth, boost profitability, and build resilience in an unpredictable world.
